005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * A Metapath atomic item with a boolean value.
015 */
016public interface IBooleanItem extends IAnyAtomicItem {
017  /**
018   * The boolean item value of {@code true}.
019   */
020  @NonNull
021  IBooleanItem TRUE = new BooleanItemImpl(true);
022  /**
023   * The boolean item value of {@code false}.
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  IBooleanItem FALSE = new BooleanItemImpl(false);
027
028  /**
029   * Construct a new boolean item using the provided string {@code value}.
030   * <p>
031   * The item will be {@link #TRUE} if the value is "1" or "true", or
032   * {@link #FALSE} otherwise
033   *
034   * @param value
035   *          a string representing a boolean value
036   * @return the new item
037   */
038  @NonNull
039  static IBooleanItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
040    IBooleanItem retval;
041    if ("1".equals(value)) {
042      retval = TRUE;
043    } else {
044      try {
045        Boolean bool = MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.BOOLEAN.parse(value);
046        retval = valueOf(bool);
047      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
048        throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(String.format("Unable to parse string value '%s'", value),
049            ex);
050      }
051    }
052    return retval;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Construct a new boolean item using the provided {@code value}.
057   *
058   * @param value
059   *          a boolean
060   * @return the new item
061   */
062  @NonNull
063  static IBooleanItem valueOf(boolean value) {
064    return value ? TRUE : FALSE;
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
069   *
070   * @param item
071   *          the item to cast
072   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
073   *         cast to this type
074   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
075   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
076   */
077  @NonNull
078  static IBooleanItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
079    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.BOOLEAN.cast(item);
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Get the "wrapped" boolean value.
084   *
085   * @return the underlying boolean value
086   */
087  boolean toBoolean();
088
089  @Override
090  default IBooleanItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
091    return cast(item);
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * Get the boolean negation of this value.
096   *
097   * @return the negated boolean value
098   */
099  @NonNull
100  default IBooleanItem negate() {
101    return this.toBoolean() ? FALSE : TRUE;
102  }
103
104  @Override
105  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
106    return compareTo(cast(item));
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Compares this value with the argument.
111   *
112   * @param item
113   *          the item to compare with this value
114   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
115   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
116   */
117  default int compareTo(@NonNull IBooleanItem item) {
118    return Boolean.compare(toBoolean(), item.toBoolean());
119  }
120}
